altername_name: Kotobuki Grand Prix: Mezase! Genchari King
name: Kotobuki Grand Prix
overview: Wacky moped racing game with a crew of SD characters. Ride through villages, towns and other locales as you strive for the finish line. In the story mode there are many different endings to find as each character has their own. The game features lots of weapons and power-ups, from Nitros to Bazookas. There are also unlockable characters and circuits.
